title: Start
body:
<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<moveDown Renata 1 60>>
Renata: Hey, look at that chair. Nobody's using it! The bartender surely couldn't mind if we....borrowed it, would he?
Mia: I bet he would.
Renata: C'mon, you go distract him while I go take it.
Mia: What do I do?
Renata: I don't know, just make something up?
Mia-miaworriedface: I...don't have a good feeling about this.
